nodes.text: Outpost Zaroshe was an outpost operated by the reconstituted Sith Empire in the Dune Sea on the planet Tatooine during the Cold War.

Outpost Zaroshe was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Imperial settlements on the planet Tatooine.
